Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields

  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.dspace.app.xmlui.aspect.artifactbrowser.AbstractSearch
    Since DSpace 4 the system use an abstraction layer named Discovery to provide access to different search providers. The legacy system built upon Apache Lucene is likely to be removed in a future version. If you are interested in using Lucene as backend for the DSpace search system, please consider to build a Lucene implementation of the Discovery interfaces
    org.dspace.app.xmlui.aspect.artifactbrowser.AdvancedSearch
    Since DSpace 4 the system use an abstraction layer named Discovery to provide access to different search providers. The legacy system built upon Apache Lucene is likely to be removed in a future version. If you are interested in using Lucene as backend for the DSpace search system, please consider to build a Lucene implementation of the Discovery interfaces
    org.dspace.app.xmlui.aspect.artifactbrowser.AdvancedSearchLoggerAction
    Since DSpace 4 the system use an abstraction layer named Discovery to provide access to different search providers. The legacy system built upon Apache Lucene is likely to be removed in a future version. If you are interested in using Lucene as backend for the DSpace search system, please consider to build a Lucene implementation of the Discovery interfaces

    org.dspace.content.crosswalk.METSRightsCrosswalk.disseminateElement(DSpaceObject)
    Do not use this method, please opt for "METSRightsCrosswalk.disseminateElement(Context context, DSpaceObject dso)" instead, as this does not internally need to create a new Context

    Please remove all direct usage of the configuration file.

    org.dspace.browse.BrowseInfo.getItemResults() 
    org.dspace.license.CreativeCommons.getLicenseText(Item)
    to make uniform JSPUI and XMLUI approach the bitstream with the license in the textual format it is no longer stored (see https://jira.duraspace.org/browse/DS-2604)

    since 4.0

    to make uniform JSPUI and XMLUI approach the bitstream with the license in the textual format it is no longer stored (see https://jira.duraspace.org/browse/DS-2604)

    use TableRowIterator.next(org.dspace.core.Context) instead. Pass an existing database connection to this method to prevent opening a new one.
